about_the_game:
"Rising City" is a city building game where you build your own city with hexagons on the endless sea.
By meeting people's needs, you can ensure their happiness and attract more people to your city.



Here's how the system works in Rising City. By building a house you gain some population.
And if you want to tax this house, you have to meet two basic needs like electricity and water.
For this, you build a power plant and a water plant that covers the hexagon where the house is located.
And now you start to earn your tax from this house. More houses means more taxes.

If you want to get more taxes after building your houses, you need to ensure that services such as parks and hospitals go to the houses.
Thus, the level of the house rises, the population increases, and the happiness of your people increases.

Remember! The people whose needs are not met will either move or die after a while.
In this case, your people will start to become unhappy and things will get worse for you.



What Does Rising City Offer?

-Feel like the Mayor
-Build procedurally generated major cities
-Gain access to new buildings with upgrades
-Play in a relaxing atmosphere
-Discover cute little models

What Doesn't Rising City Offer?

-Violence and big explosions
-Finding a gun from the ground and chasing someone, or throwing an ax from afar
-Tanks or planes
-Zombies
- Someone trying to scare you in the dark



Flare Game Studio is an independent game company founded by 4 friends who have worked in the mobile game industry.
Our goal is to produce games for computers that are cute, fun to play and easy to understand.
Rising City will be our first game.
Thank you in advance for your support.

If you want to share your questions and ideas with us during the development phase of the game, you can send us an e-mail or reach us via our Discord server.

name: Rising City

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 2GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 560, Geforce GTX 1050)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD or Intel, 4 GHz (AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Intel i5 8600)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD/NVIDIA dedicated GPU, 4GB dedicated VRAM (Radeon RX 580, Geforce GTX 1060)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
